column3:
I think we should have an 'expert' section in the Wallet tab, and move these options there.

At least personally I don't like 'Expert' as a category in itself, it's not descriptive.
Ok, so closing this. I will keep the expert section in the wallet tab in mind.\n
Another way that would be ok to me is the other way around; keep this Expert tab and create a Wallet category there.\n

@laanwj What do you think? Moved the description for spendzeroconfchange to tooltip.

![experttab3](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2814559/2436252/34eed104-add8-11e3-8f96-52d2359fb479.png)
updated to "add expert section to wallet tab in optionsdialog"\n

It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
